Title: Slaughterhouse
Writer: Graham Yost (developed for television by), Fred Golan (teleplay), Graham Yost (story), Elmore Leonard (based on the short story "Fire in the Hole" by), Nichelle D. Tramble (executive story editor), Ingrid Escajeda (story), Ryan Farley (story), Jon Worley (story)
Actors: Timothy Olyphant, Nick Searcy, Joelle Carter, Jacob Pitts
Plot: While Quarles winds up on the run from the marshals after killing a state trooper, Limehouse uses an inside source to get Boyd in trouble with the law.
